properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for signing JWT tokens.

properties.name: jwt.cookie
properties.description: Name of the cookie used for storing the JWT token in the login response.

properties.name: spnego.debug
properties.description: Enable debug output during SPGNEGO authentication. It may also be useful to set 'logging.level.org.springframework.security.kerberos: DEBUG'.

properties.name: spnego.enabled
properties.description: Whether or not Kerberos/SPNEGO authentication against ad.primary is enabled for this environment. If disabled, Basic Authentication against oid will be used.

properties.name: spnego.service-principal
properties.description: Service principal defined in Active Directory for this application. Used to verify Kerberos credentials.

properties.name: spnego.keytab
properties.description: Filesystem location of the keytab file used for verification of Kerberos credentials.
